item.title: Tooltip 9 : Combining JSON attributes using jq
item.description: In this short clip, we'll continue looking at jq to combine (first name and last name) attributes of a JSON object and then build a new attribute (full name). Requirements: jq: https://stedolan.github.io/jq/ 📝: 👉 Tested on MacOS Mojave but should work on earlier versions and all flavours of Linux 👉 Although jq is really powerful but watch out for over using it. It is probably more easier to achieve the same thing in a proper language.

item.title: Tooltip # 1 :: Creating command line launcher for IntelliJ products
item.description: This is hopefully first of many (tool)tips where I create a very short ( ~ 30sec -> 1min) video 📹covering a specific task. In this first video, we'll look at creating a command line launcher for IntelliJ. Although this is created using IntelliJ IDEA but the same option should be available in WebStorm, PhpStorm, PyCharm etc.
